meanings.definition: Cooked over an open flame or hot coals
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the barbecued chicken at the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The barbecued sausages made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The sunsets in the summer sky looked like barbecued clouds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of barbecued meat filled the backyard.

meanings.definition: To cook (food) on a barbecue grill
meanings.sent2: We will barbecue some vegetables for the party.
meanings.sent3: She barbecued the marshmallows until they were perfectly golden.
meanings.sent4: The chef barbecued the steak to perfection.
meanings.sent5: They decided to barbecue some fish for a change.
